name: RumChata® Pudding Shots
author: DebbyJean
summary: These are even better than Jell-O® shots. You could also serve these after dinner in place of dessert.
ingredients: 1 cup rum cream liqueur (such as RumChata®)
1 (4 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
directions: Mix milk, rum liqueur, and pudding mix together in a bowl until thickened
Gently stir whipped topping into pudding mixture
Spoon into disposable shot cups and place on plate
Freeze until chilled and set, at least 3 hours
